did.abstract: One 1848 lease between the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Flatbush and the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush, providing for the building and continued use of a common school on church-owned land in Flatbush School District No. 1.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lease between the Protestant Reformed Dutch Church of Flatbush and the Trustees of the Town of Flatbush, providing for the building and continued use of a common school on church-owned land in Flatbush School District No. 1. The document is dated January 1, 1848.
